крутая игра

很经典的游戏，值得补票，在这里就不多谈了，大家评测的文风、水平啥的都肯定比我好，并且夸这游戏的人也很多，所以没必要太废口舌。综上，这里做点Steam商店内的资源推荐。
  大家可以买了半条命2以后，去安装Half life 2 : Update这个Mod，一定程度上算是半条命2原作的“重制版”，体验和原版没啥差别， 不过这个免费“Mod”其实就是个独立游戏，需要购买HL2之后才能玩。
  至于想要补一代剧情的，可以考虑一下Black Mesa，虽然剧情上有点缺点，但是是个不错的非官方重制版，比官方重制的Half life Source好一些。
上边提到的这些游戏的链接如下：
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/290930/HalfLife_2_Update]HL 2 Update链接[/url]
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/362890/Black_Mesa]Black Mesa （HL1非官方重制版）[/url]
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/280/HalfLife_Source]HL 起源（官方重置版）[/url]
[spoiler]（说白了其实当年HL2出的时候我还在玩三角洲，直到后来过了很久才碰到......所以玩起来感触不深。但是在咱们看来，Half life系列游戏的剧本放在今天也绝对是个很好的题材，时空传送门、黑洞、系外文明的入侵、Revolution of Freedom......都是很有剧情意义和思考意义的，无愧于第九艺术大作的名号，尤其它宣扬的王侯将相宁有种乎的精神真的很值得敬佩。另外，在今天看来游戏性贼差的、没有提示的解密，也算是找回了过去的一点感觉吧，虽然玩着很累，但是最后结束的时候成就感真心爆棚。要知道以前买张游戏光盘回来，还得特地看那本厚厚的攻略，或者是爬遍整个地区，才找到角落那个颜色超级融入场景的梯子）[/spoiler]
[spoiler][strike][h1]推荐打折时补票233，另外，Half Life 3什么时候出？[/h1][/strike][/spoiler]

This game is still revolutionary. Awesome.

If you haven't played this game yet, pick it up. Its revolutionary source engine, while not up to today's standards, can still hold tons of enjoyment. The story, while admittedly generic, is told through characters so classic I'll forget them. Valve knows how to tell compelling stories with it's environments and characters, but only time will tell if we ever get a third installment to this beloved series.
The game makes me feel like I am the character and whenever I replay it's like I'm playing for the 1st time again.

h

By far one of my favorite games. It's fun, it's exciting, has a great story. I've replayed this game so many times on the original Xbox and the 360. My play time on Steam hardly reflects how many hours I've put into this game overall.

 It's a classic, most people seem to get acquainted with the series because of HL2. I sure did, and I love all the Half-Life games. 

Buy it. Play it. It's great!

P.S. : No, there will never be a Half-Life 3. Read Epistle 3 and find out the conclusion to the Half-Life story for yourself. It's canon, it's written by the same guy who, from my understanding, did most of the story writing for the series. Just read it and be content with the games we already have.

Um clássico dos games, do pc e dos single players.  Um FPS cativante, com um protagonista cativante, com história cativante, personagens cativantes... o jogo é todo um marco, uma sequência digna e maravilhosa do primeiro, a espera por um Half-Life 3 sempre aumenta ao voltar a jogar o HL2 e a diversão não se perde mesmo com o passar de mais de uma década.

Отличная игра!

For buying this game as a Garry's mod afterthought, I was genuinely surprised at how great this game was. I went in with my perception of the game tinged by the goofiness of its mod, and it was unbelievably sobering. A dystopian future where humans all serve as sensually-stifled cogs is a harrowing inversion of western society's current state. The sci-fi horror undertones in an otherwise realistic atmosphere make for deeply emotional moments throughout your journey and, for the first time in an action adventure game, caught me feeling genuinely lonely and helpless as I went down to Ravenholm. The end was a considerable cliffhanger, but I have yet to purchase the follow-up episodes.

10/10 would play again
Best game ever made.
I keep replaying it, I have a serious problem.

Ya lo he jugado varias veces, y jamás me aburro de su acción y aventura. Una trama increíblemente bien trazada y que vale la pena jugar en difícil, para que la experiencia sea divertida hasta para quienes saben de FPS. Sus puzzles le dan un aire distinto, y la seriedad de los temas que toca en su trasfondo es tan sorprendente, que la mezcla entre su historia y su jugabilidad, hacen de este juego, una maravilla. La contra más molesta es la pantalla de carga, que corta la fluidez al juego, por lo demás, excelente y recomendadísimo.
Jogo muito legal, pena que não consegui ativar as legendas
